title: [Request] - Allow disenchanting for all loot items currently owned
body: I nearly own all the champions, and so when I get a new capsule there is normally at least 2,3 sometimes more champion shards. wondering if we could include a *disenchant all shards already owned* option, as the majority of the time its just a bunch of manual dusting which can be tedious, as they are unsuable in any other form

replies.body:
i would like to point out many players may acciendently use this could you maybe give some more details of how you think this should work?
does it prompt you with a warning?
all skin shards? 
just champs?
more details please

1- It could prompt although it would be irrelevant as currently there is no use for the champion shards of currently own champions aside from converting into Blue Essence. Perhaps have a *do not prompts me again* warning for those who care about having a collection of unusable shards
2 - There could be an option for already owned skin shards, as again, the only options available for shards of currently owned stuff is to disenchant.
I would be equally happy with having currently owned champion skins being removed from the pool of possible skins available in loot preventing duplicate skin shards.

Obviously the button would not dust champion shards for champions you down own.

An example of why this is relevant is in my last level up box I got 3 ashe shards.
It is the same reasoning that the key system can be tedious, because instead of being able to skip animation your forced to forge the key, and then open the loot box. I know its small but its tedious over time with needless actions
